Dubai, United Arab Emirates :-
Elegance and exclusivity in one of the most thrilling areas of Dubai
You will feel like you can touch the skyscrapers that dominate the city skyline from the tranquillity of Dukes The Palm, a Royal Hideaway Hotel .
Located in the exclusive area of Palm Jumeirah on the coast of the Arabian Gulf, the views of Dubai are the backdrop to a stay where elegance and exclusivity are the outstanding features.
Luxury, the hallmark of the Royal Hideaway brand, can be found in each of the 279 rooms and 64 suites and in each of the 287 one-bedroom apartments. At Dukes The Palm, a Royal Hideaway Hotel, each room has been designed with every last detail in mind, to make sure your trip is a unique experience.\xa0
Next to a magnificent private beach, the hotel offers state-of-the-art facilities and exclusive service, with impressive restaurants where guests can enjoy special dishes, authentic flavours and entertainment. 
The hotel also has an indoor swimming pool and a spectacular infinity pool, as well as an innovative Kids Club for the youngest members of the family.\xa0
Any special occasion or business trip held in the incredible setting at Palm Jumeirah will be a guaranteed success. Furthermore, this famous 5-star hotel is equipped with all the facilities required for meetings and weddings and is easily accessible since it is only 10 minutes by car from Dubai Marina and 35 minutes from Al Maktoum International Airport (DWC), among other places of interest.\xa0
